dcterms:creator: N. Dalal
B. Triggs
dcterms:description: The INRIA dataset contains 2416 pedestrian samples and 1218 person-free images for training, as well as 1126 pedestrian samples and 453 person-free images for testing. The main challenges of the INRIA dataset are variations in pose, background and partial occlusions.
dcterms:title: INRIA

dcterms:creator: S. Munder
D. Gavrila
dcterms:description: The DaimlerChrysler dataset contains three training sets and two test sets. Each training and test set contains 4800 pedestrian samples and 5000 negative samples. Additionally, each training set contains 1200 person-free images where further negative samples can be obtained. Detection on this dataset is more difficult due to the small size of the samples and the challenging negative set.
dcterms:title: DaimlerChrysler
